text:
Introducing our July cover star, @ChrissyTeigen! She's built a following, reputation, and career on being real and relatable. But even in an era of TMI, she's still discovering herself. Click the link in our bio to read her unfiltered conversation with executive beauty & health editor @jenn_edit. Styled by @edmondalison and photographed by #MichelangelodiBattista. Hair by @teddycharles35 Makeup by @storyofmailife Manicure by @christinaviles #chrissyteigen

A post shared by Marie Claire (@marieclairemag) on Jun 14, 2017 at 5:30am PDT
title: Chrissy Teigen's planning on adding to her family, but probably not in the way that you think

og.title: Chrissy Teigen's planning on adding to her family, but probably not in the way that you think - Today's Parent
og.description: Looks like the Teigen-Legend fam will be getting a new member sooner rather than later!
